summary:
Author of the books "sales is my passion" and "Career Path Compass"

Online trainer with several courses available on the most successful online education platforms.

- Sales "hunter" and "farmer" with high-level negotiation skills
- Enthusiastic and energetic with a calm pace.
- Diversity & Inclusiveness promoter

From sales to procurement, on a journey to help gear up the company's European strategy and projects on circular economy and recycling solutions for plastic waste.

Customer Relationship Coordinator. Order to Cash activities, manage a portfolio of several customers of Chemicals bulk product of a certain Euro region. Interaction with different internal and external stakeholders (product managers, supply, plants, credit, commercial managers) as well as other members of the PL and the all business. Working in alignment with PL towards objectives. Main Figures:
- Customers: >40 
- Order lines > 140 / 160 (month)
- Complaints: 0

Main Tasks: Order to cash responsible. able to quick embrace and manage an heavy role of multi PL (SMPO and Brake Fluids) due to language skills. Excellent relations with customers, commercial team, internal and external stakeholders. Controlling allocations, overdue’s, supply issues, proposing alternatives and improvements in a perfect cooperation with AE. I Kept the business running when AE retired and during 3 months there was no clear solution. Still as CRC, After new AE was assigned I took the Case Polyols part of Iberia, in close contact with PM, giving me experience and visibility as a person and my sales skills. Order entry, liaising with hauliers, land logistics, plants, customers, HSSE, Product line stakeholders, Credit and others. Assigned to the French and Spanish market.

Customers from France, England, Spain, Germany.
